hours_text:
# Visit the  
Snowsports   
Museum

#### **Open Daily 10 am-6 pm.**   
Free for all visitors, the Colorado Snowsports Museum tells the rich story of skiing and snowboarding in Colorado.

Located on the 3rd level of the Vail Village Parking Structure adjacent to Vail Village Covered Bridge. The Museum does not charge admission but as a non-profit, a donation of $10 is appreciated. The Vail Village Parking Structure is free after 3 PM.

collections_text:
## Featured Museum Collections

##### Permanent Collection

### Out There.   
The Evolution   
of Snowboarding

[Learn more](https://snowsportsmuseum.org/exhibits/)

##### Permanent Collection

### Climb to Glory.  
Legacy of the  
10th Mountain  
Division

[Learn more](https://snowsportsmuseum.org/exhibits/)

##### New Exhibition

### Letters Home.  
Digital Deep Dive  
on the 10th
